{{gT("LimeSurvey LS6 Theme")}}
{{gT("The latest and freshest theme to offer a flexible use. It is based on the classic fruity theme.")}}

survey.name: {{ gT("Template Sample") }}
survey.description:
{{ gT('This is a sample survey description. It could be quite long.') }}

{{ gT("But this one isn't.") }}
survey.welcome:
{{ gT('Welcome to this sample survey')}}

{{ gT('You should have a great time doing this') }}
survey.therearexquestions: gT('There is 2 question in this survey'])
survey.datasecurity_notice: {{ gT("Your privacy policy text is shown here.") }}

group.name: {{ gT("Group 1: The first lot of questions") }}
group.description: {{ gT("This group description is fairly vacuous, but quite important.") }}

question_1.text: {{ gT("How many roads must a man walk down?") }}
question_1.valid_message: {{ gT("Choose one of the following answers") }}

question_2.valid_message: {{ gT("Hint when response is not valid") }}

assessments.name: {{ gT("Welcome to the Assessment") }}
assessments.message: {{ gT("You got {TOTAL} points out of 3 possible points.") }}

quotas.sMessage: {{ gT("Sorry your responses have exceeded a quota on this survey.") }}
